Action: Test Publisher Update Request Search Interactions
Go to the DOAJ admin applications search at /publisher/progress
Expected Test Results:
* All available records are found, and the first page of results is shown
* Results are sorted by last updated date, oldest first
* On the left facet "Application Status" is open

Action: Open one of the facets of your choice
Select one of the values for that facet
Expected Test Results:
* All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown
* The filter applied is shown in the facets on the left and above the search results

Action: Go through each sort option in the "sort by" pull-down
In each case, click the "sort by" button to reverse the direction of sort
Expected Test Results: * The current search results are ordered correctly according to the selected sort field and the selected sort direction

Action: Enter a search term in the search box
Expected Test Results:
* All the results for the selected constraints are found, and the first page is shown
* Your search text ramains in the search box

Action: Go through each field constraint under the "search all" pull-down.  You may change your search text if no results are found, to demonstrate that each field works correctly
Expected Test Results:
* If there are search results, the first page is displayed
* If there are no search results, suitable "no results match" text is displayed

Action: Change the page size, using the page-size pull-down
Expected Test Results: * The size of the page of results displays increases appropriately

Action: Click the "Next" button to go to the next page of results
Expected Test Results:
* The next page of results is displayed
* The "First" and "Prev" buttons are activated

Action: Click "Next" again
Click "Prev"
Expected Test Results: * You are navigated one page forward and then one page back in the results

Action: Click "First"
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the first page of the results

Action: Click the Red X button to clear all filters
Expected Test Results: * The interface returns to the initial state as per 1.1.1

Action: Test Admin Application Search Display
Go to the DOAJ admin application search at /admin/applications
Open the "Application Status" facet and select "Accepted"
Expected Test Results: * Every result includes the text "This update request has been accepted, and your journal in DOAJ updated (view request)." on the bottom right

Action: Click on "View request" for one of the results
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the edit form for the application but it is read only (there is a warning displayed at the top of the page "Please note this form is read-only, you cannot make changes here."

Action: Click "Back"
Clear the "Accepted" filter and select "Rejected"
Expected Test Results: * Every result includes the text "This update request has been rejected, and your journal in DOAJ updated (view request)." on the bottom right

Action: Click "Back"
Clear the "Accepted" filter and select any status other than "Accepted" or "Rejected"
Expected Test Results: * Every result includes the text "This update request is currently being reviewed by an Editor (view request)." on the bottom right

Action: Click on "View request" for one of the results
